codeList:
# new-values.yaml
minio:
  resources:
     limits:
       cpu: 2
       memory: 8Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yam;
minio:
  zones: 2
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
kafka:
  resources:
     limits:
        cpu: 2
        memory: 12Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
kafka:
  replicaCount: 4
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
pulsar:
  broker:
    resources:
       limits:
         cpu: 4
         memory: 16Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
pulsar:
  bookkeeper:
    resources:
       limits:
         cpu: 4
         memory: 16Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
pulsar:
  bookkeeper:
    volumes:
      journal:
        size: 20Gi
        storageClassName: gp3
# new-values.yaml
pulsar:
  broker:
    replicaCount: 3
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
pulsar:
  bookkeeper:
    replicaCount: 3
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
etcd:
  resources:
     limits:
       cpu: 2
       memory: 8Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
etcd:
  replicaCount: 5
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus

anchorList.label: Add an extra MinIO server pool (Recommended)
Increase resource per Kafka broker pod
Add an extra Kafka broker pool (Recommended)
Increase resources per Pulsar broker pod
Increase resources per Pulsar bookie pod
Add an extra Pulsar broker pod
Add an extra Pulsar bookie pod (Recommended)
